programme.title: Space Channel AFTER DARK
programme.desc: Join Walter Lloyd on a trip across the cosmos from the night-side of Earth. Duration: 14400

programme.title: Daybreak'ing News
programme.desc: With correspondents stationed around the world, Space Channel News covers every aspect of the space industry, from the latest mission, groundbreaking innovation, or a major news event. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Cinespace: for all Humanity
programme.desc: Space Channel Presents Cinespace, an partnership between The Houston Cinema Arts Society and NASA. These are award winning movies that will definitely inspire. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Cosmic Vibrations
programme.desc: A musical and visual celebration of our connection with our home planet and the universe. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Mining and Farming in Space
programme.desc: Updates on Blue Origin, Virgin Galactic , Farming in space, mining asteroids and the creator of UFO, the first space-based ETF. Duration: 9000

programme.title: TrailerPalooza
programme.desc: The latest trailers from outer space Duration: 3600

programme.title: The Ultimate Penthouse
programme.desc: Space Tourist takes us out of this world to a company making plans to build a hotel in space as well as those closer to home. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movies
programme.desc: In Cradle, Eade and her dad are on the return journey to earth when an explosion cripples the craft and seriously injures her father. In New Mars, a generation lives underground on Mars preparing to begin a new life as the colonists of a planet which is being terraformed into a new habitable world. Finally, Kaya Torres is circling a black hole in a pod. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Robinson Crusoe on Mars
programme.desc: Commander Kit Draper is forced to crash-land on Mars when his mission goes horribly wrong. He must figure out how to find oxygen, water, and food on the lifeless planet. Duration: 9000

programme.desc: A guided tour across the universe on a space ship made of art and sound. Duration: 14400
